title.romaji: Qing Chi Hong Xiao Dou Ba!

description:
Beanie's Daily is a short film series with a duration of 3min-4min. The protagonist is a Red bean that dreams of being eaten. His daily job is staying in the red bean smoothie, smashed red bean bun, red bean bubble tea and so on, waiting for being eaten. Although he has never realized his dream(of being eaten), but he has met many friends at work, such as pearls, medlar, aloe vera, etc., and he start knowing that making his dream come true is not the most important thing. The most important thing in life should be happy living.

(Source: REDPEA Animation)
